short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify your prompt engineering and say goodbye to repetitive typing in each prompt!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With ParaPrompt, you can save, manage, and quickly insert pre-defined templates into your prompts with just a click of a button.

ðŸŸ¡ Features:

âœ¨ Save and Manage Templates: 
Easily create and organize your own prompt templates for quick access.

âœ¨ Quick Insertion:
Insert templates into the LLM-provider chat input with a single click.

âœ¨ Variables Support:
Use variables in your templates using {{ }} syntax to create dynamic and customisable prompts.

âœ¨ Import and Export Templates:
Share your custom prompt templates with others or back them up for use across different devices.

âœ¨ Copy Templates:
Quickly copy template content to paste anywhere you want.
